BR.name: Puppies 3D
BR.description: Relacione-se e interaja com uma família de cachorrinhos adoráveis, em um mundo realista e em 3D, e selecione das raças mais populares. Adote seus cachorros, cuide deles, brinque com eles, faça exercício com eles, socialize e dê treinamento, tudo em um mundo muito real e interativo em três dimensões! Puppies 3D vai levar você até uma cidade que adora cachorros e com muitas pessoas interessantes com quem poderá interagir. - Adote e cuide de 12 das mais populares raças de cães. - Interaja e treine seus cachorros virtuais como se eles fossem animais de verdade. - Explore uma cidade cheia de pessoas e outros cachorros.

CA.name: Puppies 3D
CA.description: Bond and interact with a family of the most adorable puppies in a lifelike, 3D world, and choose from the most popular breeds. Adopt your very own puppies, take care of them, play with them, exercise with them, train them, and socialize, all in an incredibly realistic and interactive three-dimensional environment! Puppies 3D will fully transport you to a puppy-loving town with interesting townsfolk to interact with. - Adopt and care for 12 of the most popular dog breeds. - Interact and train your virtual dogs as if they were real pets. - Explore a village full of discovery with people and other dogs.

MX.name: Puppies 3D
MX.description: Crea lazos e interactúa con una familia de cachorritos en un mundo realista en 3D. Podrás elegir entre las razas más conocidas. Adopta a tus cachorritos, cuídalos, juega y haz ejercicio con ellos, entrénalos y socializad en un increíble entorno tridimensional, realista e interactivo. Con Puppies 3D conocerás un pueblo que adora a los cachorritos y donde vive un montón de gente interesante con la que interactuar. - Adopta y cuida a 12 de las razas caninas más conocidas. - Interactúa y educa a tus perros virtuales como si fueran mascotas de verdad. - Explora este pueblo lleno de sorpresas e interactúa con personas y perros.

US.description: Bond and interact with a family of the most adorable puppies in a lifelike, 3D world, and choose from the most popular breeds. Adopt your very own puppies, take care of them, play with them, exercise with them, train them, and socialize, all in an incredibly realistic and interactive three-dimensional environment! Puppies 3D will fully transport you to a puppy-loving town with interesting townsfolk to interact with. - Adopt and care for 12 of the most popular dog breeds. - Interact and train your virtual dogs as if they were real pets. - Explore a village full of discovery with people and other dogs.
